description:
The game 3030 is a 2D pixelated platform game made using the Godot gaming engine. This game is fantasy and magic themed where the player controls a young mage who ventures across several lands in order to lift a curse that has been laid upon them. Fighting against a multitude of deadly enemies during his journey, his objective is to reach the dark tower where the origin of the curse lies. When he reaches the cursed tower, he must face the dark lord who resides within the tower in order to save humanity.

Official Website
